articles.title: Traces of cyanide found in cups of Vietnamese and Americans found dead in Bangkok hotel, police say - The Associated Press
articles.description: Initial autopsy results showed traces of cyanide in the blood of six people who were found dead in a room at a central Bangkok luxury hotel. The bodies were found Tuesday in Grand Hyatt Erawan Hotel in downtown Bangkok. They had last been seen alive Monday af…
articles.content: BANGKOK (AP) Initial autopsy results showed traces of cyanide in the blood of six Vietnamese and American guests at a central Bangkok luxury hotel and one of them is believed to have poisoned the oth… [+4042 chars]

articles.author: Jorge Castillo
articles.title: 1st-time All-Star Duran shines in MVP effort for AL - ESPN
articles.description: Boston's Jarren Duran, the All-Star MVP, hit a tiebreaking two-run homer in the fifth inning and the American League beat the National League 5-3 on Tuesday night for its 10th win in the past 11 All-Star Games.

articles.title: Chelsea's Enzo Fernandez apologizes for Argentina's 'offensive' France song - India Today
articles.description: Chelsea star Enzo Fernandez has issued an apology after filming himself singing an alleged racist and transphobic chant following Argentina039s 1-0 win over Colombia in the Copa America final
